src:
Arema Timpang, Badak Lampung Tetap Waspada
01 Nov 2019, 02:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Absennya sejumlah penggawa Arema FC, yang akan menjadi lawan mereka pada lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, tak membuat Milan Petrovic kehilangan kewaspadaan. Pelatih Badak Lampung ini mengaku bahwa Arema tetap perkasa, kendati tanpa sejumlah pemain pilar mereka.
"Arema adalah tim kuat. Kehilangan beberapa pemain tak akan banyak berpengaruh pada mereka," kata Milan.
"Mereka masih punya pemain-pemain berkualitas. Saya tahu kekuatan mereka karena musim lalu saya menangani mereka," sambungnya.
Badak Lampung akan melakoni laga pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra Arema. Pertandingan ini akan dihelat di Stadion Sumpah Pemuda PKOR, Bandar Lampung, Jumat (01/11).
Dalam pertandingan ini, Arema dipastikan tak tampil dengan skuad terbaik mereka. Sejumlah pemain pilar klub berlogo singa mengepal ini harus absen pada laga kontra Badak Lampung. Terakhir, mereka kehilangan gelandang andalan, Hendro Siswanto.
Saat ini, Badak Lampung berada di peringkat 17, dengan raihan 23 poin dari 25 pertandingan. Sementara, Arema berada di peringkat enam klasemen. Mereka mengoleksi 38 angka dari 24 pertandingan.

Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Arema Timpang, Lampung Rhinos remain alert
Nov 01 2019, 02:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The absence of a number of penggawa Arema FC, who will be their opponents in the continued Shopee League 1 season 2019, did not make Milan Petrovic lose vigilance. The Lampung Rhinoceros coach admitted that Arema remained mighty, even without a number of their pillar players.
"Arema is a strong team. Losing some players will not have much effect on them," Milan said.
"They still have quality players. I know their strengths because last season I handled them," he continued.
Lampung rhino will play 26th Shopee Liga 1 match in 2019, contra Arema. This game will be held at the PKOR Youth Oath Stadium, Bandar Lampung, Friday (01/11).
In this match, Arema certainly did not appear with their best squad. A number of club players with the logo of a clenched lion must be absent in the match against the Lampung Rhinos. Finally, they lost the mainstay midfielder, Hendro Siswanto.
Currently, Lampung Rhinos are ranked 17th, with 23 points from 25 matches. Meanwhile, Arema is ranked sixth in the standings. They collected 38 points from 24 matches.
